entries.title: Meta ends support for original Quest headset after less than 4 years
entries.description: Quest 2 and Quest Pro will be unaffected, for now.

entries.title: How will 2023 TVs address OLED’s biggest flaws?
entries.description: CES 2023 promised brighter OLED, but LCDs still have a major advantage.

entries.title: RIP Surface Duo—Microsoft reportedly gives up on the weird form factor
entries.description: But Microsoft is still "all-in" with Android, plans a Galaxy Fold-style device.

entries.title: Moderna CEO: 400% price hike on COVID vaccine “consistent with the value”
entries.description: Lawmakers have already called Pfizer's similar plan "pure and deadly greed."

entries.title: FCC’s new broadband map greatly overstates actual coverage, senators say
entries.description: Errors suggest ISPs are claiming to serve more homes than they actually do.

entries.title: Kang the Conqueror is shattering timelines in new Quantumania trailer
Report: Apple plans to use its own Wi-Fi and Bluetooth chip in future iPhones
entries.description: End goal is said to be one chip that can handle Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and cellular.

entries.title: A humble request for more weird Nintendo Switch controllers
entries.description: Nyxi's GameCube-style buttons show the way to more weird control layout options.

entries.title: Brazil riots trigger widespread content bans on Facebook, YouTube
entries.description: Content moderators began working with Brazilian authorities before the election.

entries.title: Here’s where traffic sucked the most in 2022
entries.description: Data from Inrix's 2022 Global Traffic Scorecard finds Chicago has the US's worst traffic.

entries.title: Closing time: Windows 7 and Windows 8.1 have received their last updates
entries.description: Major browsers like Chrome and Edge are also ending support for these platforms.

entries.title: Even before Monday’s launch failure, Virgin Orbit’s finances were dismal
entries.description: Some financial analysts believe the company will run out of money in March.

entries.title: Messenger billed as better than Signal is riddled with vulnerabilities
entries.description: Threema comes with unusually strong claims. They crumble under new research findings.

entries.title: Last year marked the end of an era in spaceflight—here’s what we’re watching next
entries.description: Will Artemis happen? Can Starship actually work? Will humans destroy low-Earth orbit?

entries.title: The first orbital launch attempt from the UK ends in failure
entries.description: This is likely to be a devastating launch failure for Virgin Orbit.

entries.title: Pediatricians now recommend drugs and surgery for kids with obesity
entries.description: Doctors step up fight against childhood obesity, say "watchful waiting" doesn't work.
